objectdetection

Class ObjectDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • objectdetection.ObjectDetector

  • public class ObjectDetector
extends java.lang.Object
    This class uses the ColorPoller and the UltraSonicPoller to determine if an object is within a collision range, if it should be investigated and whether it is the correct color block or not
    Author:
    Peter Henderson

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void collisionIsEminent()
      This sends a callback to the StateMachine that there is a collision coming
      ObjectDetector getInstance()
      Returns the singleton objectDetector
      boolean isCorrectColor()
      Determines if the block is the correct color based on the config file and the value from the colorPoller
      boolean shouldInvestigate()
      Determines if the object is in the target area and whether the robot should investigate the object's color

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
